abstract: Ad of the Week column highlights campaign ad from Hillary Clinton-aligned super PAC Priorities USA accusing Donald J Trump of sexism and false boasts about his business success.

headline.print_headline: Turning Calling Card Into an Indictment
headline.main: Foes Point to ‘Con Man’ Trump and ‘Toxic’ Clinton

snippet: The Democrats hit Donald J. Trump hard on his claim to fame, his business skills. The Republicans tie Democratic candidates to Hillary Clinton’s baggage.
lead_paragraph: The Democrats hit Donald J. Trump hard on his claim to fame, his business skills. The Republicans tie Democratic candidates to Hillary Clinton’s baggage.
